name: PotC
author: Miki Sayaka

tips.Claiming: Norrington is always the safest claim. However, due to Barbossa's ability to pierce, it may be wisest to wait until the day to claim.
tips.Motley Crew: Jack escapes a single lynch and a single daykill. It may be best to lynch Murtogg/Mullroy to kill him.
tips.EITC: The East India Trading Company. The key role here is Beckett, who has 99 votes and has various ways of defending himself.
tips.Redcoats: Murtogg, Mullroy, and Privateers are all redcoats, but when they are lynched, who knows what will happen?

summary: We pillage, we plunder, we rifle and loot - drink up me 'earties, yo-ho! The pirates of the seven seas are clashing in a battle of epic stories yet to be told! Will the dreaded Barbossa capture Port Royal and take the Pearl for himself? Or will Jack Sparrow reclaim his freedom and his dearly beloved ship? Can the Royal Navy rid the world of pirate scum forever? Who will remain at the end of this vicious tale?

roles.help: Commodore James Norrington, it is up to you to defend Port Royal from the scourge of pirates! As such, you can /Inspect people during the night to uncover any noxious misdeeds they may have done! You may choose to expose your own identity with /Reveal. If anyone dare try to kill you during the day, you will expose them! Additionally, your command on the battlefield gives you a vote of 2. It may be wise to claim and get your comrades to /Watch and /Protect you!
roles.info: Can Inspect at night. Can self-reveal during day. Exposes daykillers. Vote counts as 2. ~Sided~

roles.help: Lieutenant Gillette! You are the right-hand man of Commodore Norrington, the local head of the Royal Navy. Defend the port in the name of the King with your /Protect! You are also able to protect during the day with your vote of -2.
roles.info: Bodyguard with a vote of -2. ~Sided~

roles.help: Theodore Groves! Keep your vigil over the town of Port Royal and /Watch your comrades to see by whom they're visited. If you find any pirates, you can tell the village to lynch them during the day with /Pirate [name]!

pirate.msg: Did you see any suspicious activity? If so, expose the /Pirate!

roles.help: You have always dreamed of meeting a pirate. But now that you finally have, it's time stop them from plundering your hometown! Use your wits and bravery to /Distract someone during the night. You double the vote count of whomever you vote, thanks to your courage and charisma (though being the governor's daughter doesn't hurt)!
roles.info: Distractor. Vote multiplier of 2. ~Sided~

distract.distractmsg: "I've come to make an accord." These were the last words you heard before finding yourself unconscious under a pair of oars!

roles.help: A Blacksmith, a Pirate, a Pretty Boy - who cares what they call you, you must rescue Elizabeth! You can use your refined sword skills to /Kill someone during the standby phase! Be warned that your rash behaviour will cause you to be seen as a pirate.
roles.info: Appears as a Pirate if Inspected. Can kill (revealing) during standby. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can now /Kill, but be warned that you will be exposed!

roles.help: Wetherby Swann, duly appointed Governor of Port Royal, your political prestige is more than enough to give you the power to cancel any lynch! Whomever you vote for WILL NOT be hanged!

roles.help: You are the head of the East India Trading company. All who oppose you shall face the gallows. As such, your vote counts for 99. Since you're such an upstanding citizen, the Royal Navy will see you as an ally. The vast amount of resources at your disposal allow you to /Protect, /Distract, /Inspect and /Poison on non-consecutive nights. It's just good business.
roles.info: Vote counts as 99. Can Protect, Distract, Inspect, and Poison on non-consecutive nights. If exposed, shown to be sided with the Royal Navy. Sided with EITC.

poison.poisonDeadMessage: You succumbed to an insidious poison. This is what happens when you accept drinks from Beckett.

roles.help: Ian Mercer, you are the right-hand man of Lord Beckett. The most devious and underhanded tasks are left to you. You may /Kill during the night. In addition, you have a chance of finding killers!
roles.info: Haxes kill. Can kill. ~Sided~

roles.help: The Spy of the East India Trading Company, you can /Inspect people during the night to see if they are pirates! Pass this information onto your partners with /tt. You can also /kill during standby, but you will be revealed!
roles.info: Can Inspect and can kill during Standby. Sided with EITC.

kill.msg: You can now /kill, but you will be exposed if you do!

roles.help: To ferry the souls of the dead to the other world, that was your charter given to you by the goddess Calypso. But now the Flying Dutchman serves a different purpose. /Curse the scoundrels and so they join your crew once every two nights! With your heart locked away, you feel no pain and cannot be killed during the night!
roles.info: Can convert someone into a Cursed Crewman once every two nights. Cannot be nightkilled. Sided with the Flying Dutchman.

onDeath.convertmsg: There is no one around to tame the Kraken anymore! It may now kill twice per day!

roles.help: You are now chartered to sail the seas for 100 years under the Flying Dutchman! You can /Kill during the night.
roles.info: A converted role recruited by Davy Jones. Can kill. ~Sided~

roles.help: The most feared beast in all the seas, the Kraken - that is you! /Kill your enemies during standby while the deep dark sea keeps you hidden. You cannot be killed during the night!
roles.info: Can kill during standby (non-revealing). Powers up if Davy Jones dies. Sided with the Flying Dutchman.

kill.msg: Type /Kill [name] to kill someone! You won't be exposed.

kill.msg: Type /Kill [name] to kill someone! You can now do this twice per day, but you may be exposed!

roles.help: Aye, Captain Barbossa of the Black Pearl, that be yer name; whose insatiable greed brought a curse of immortality upon yerself, you cannot be killed while the moon shines! You can use your /Cannon the welp who dare oppose you, outpacing all the bodyguards, but there's a chance you'll be seen, so it's safer to use your /Cutlass on most nights! Quite the eloquent talker y'are, so you double the vote count on whomever you vote for!
roles.info: Leader of the Ghost Crew. Can Kill (command: Cutlass). Can use /Cannon to kill before Protect, but has a chance of being haxed by any other role. Cannot be nightkilled. Kills distractors. Vote multiplier of 2.

roles.help: Cursed pirates be your team! You can /Kill one person during the night (shared with Pintel). Be sure to not lose your eye!
roles.info: Shares kill with Pintel. Sided with Cursed Crew.

roles.help: Cursed pirates be your team! You can /Kill one person during the night (shared with Ragetti). Blast the madmen that came up with "parlay"!
roles.info: Shares kill with Ragetti. Sided with Cursed Crew.

roles.help: What? You're just a harmless monkey! Well, perhaps a harmless monkey that can't die! You're pretty nimble, so you can /Stalk two people per night! Due to being a subordinate species of primate, your vote only counts for 0.5.
roles.info: Can stalk twice per night. Ignores nightkills. Sided with Cursed Crew.

roles.help: Captain, CAPTAIN Jack Sparrow!! They need to fix the bloody roles list. In the meantime, /Kill the welp that try to capture the infamous Captain you are! You also carry a pistol carrying with a single shot, so you can /Shoot the one person you want to dead the most during the day! And of course, if you do happen to get caught by the Navy, you can conjure up some brilliant scheme to escape the gallows at least once!
roles.info: Can kill. Escapes a single lynch. Evades a single daykill. Ignores Distractors after being lynched. Has a single daykill. ~Sided~

roles.help: Deep within the bayou swamps of Cuba resides the legendary soothsayer Tia Dalma. Long have the pirates been oppressed by the national governments and corporate interests. No longer! /Inspect twice per night to seek your pirate allies. You with with anyone except Blackbeard, the East India Trading Company, and the Royal Navy, and your vote counts as 4!

roles.help: If you don't kill a man every now and then they'll forget who you are, so you better /kill two people every night! Your vote counts as 3.5, and you can only die to Barbossa or the Kraken!
roles.info: Can kill twice during the night. Ignores nightkills from everyone except Barbossa, Will, and Vengefuls. Ignores Hax. Vote counts as 3.5. ~Sided~

changelog.July 15, 2014: Norrington is given a vote of 2. Beckett gets 3 self-protects for now. Changed nonpeak 5-8 player a bit (and minplayers to 5). Beckett has a -99 voteshield now.
changelog.July 16, 2014: Beckett's command is now /Defend. It Protects him and kills any attackers (it can still be pierced however). Gilette's Protect also works like Neighbour's /Greet. Removed Gilette's hax. Swapped Mercer and Steng's abilities.
changelog.July 18, 2014: Gibbs now appears as village-sided if exposed. Norrington and Gilette are connected on startup. Smoothed some flavour issues.
changelog.July 19, 2014: Beckett has limited BGs based on how many nightkilling pirates there are, and doesn't counter nightkills. Tweaked spawn. Experimental nonpeak added.
changelog.July 21, 2014: Will's kill doesn't pierce anymore. He can get Liz to PL roles that can Protect themselves for the same effect. Will (and also Vengefuls Mullroy and Murtogg) can kill Barbossa, Davey Jones, the Kraken, and Blackbeard now.
changelog.August 9, 2014: Jack can Protect while Killing. Removed cooldown on Barbossa's Cannon; however, he can be haxed (5%) by anyone any time he uses it. Barbossa can be PL'd now, but Cannon outspeeds. Reversed Jack's distract immunity (now is only after lynch). Removed Gilette/Norrington startup and Liz/Will hax.
changelog.August 25, 2014: Will is now a Samurai. Jack evades one daykill. Murtogg/Mullroy appear as Pirates when exposed. New nonpeak!
changelog.January 24, 2014: Major update. Norrington now Inspects. Jack no longer Protects. Gibbs no longer Distracts and now Protects. Beckett is now a JOAT and can Poison, Protect, Inspect, or Distract every night but must alternate. Spawn is pretty different now too. Privateers bomb last voter. Mullroy/Murtogg can't kill immunes, but their kill is broadcast. Gilette has -2 vote again.
